person.note: German businessman. Recorded in Berlin street directories at Jerusalemstraße 63 from 1874 to at least 1894.

note.p: Correspondence vol. 25, letter from Hugo Schneider, 10 February 1877
Digitale Landesbibliotheque Berlin, Berlin address directories, 1799–1970, digital.zlb.de/viewer/berliner-adressbuecher/ (accessed 17 August 2021)
